resources.string: Warning: Device Admin is going to be disabled.
This app is not a device admin!
This app is not the device owner!

Solitude Kiosk is a great tool build for corporate-owned, single-use (COSU) devices to provide complete isolation. 
 
 How does it work? 
 1. Start application 
 2. Provide the password for admin 
 3. Grant the permission (if asked) 
 4. Press below kiosk start button. 
 5. Sit and relax till your phone does the restriction for you
